text: 本商品電子兌換憑證僅限台灣地區使用，可於指定兌換期限內至限定星巴克門市兌換，逾期無效，除部份公告不適用門市外，恕不得更換現金或其他商品，禁止轉讓、轉售與退換貨，不適用於外送外賣及預訂服務。 公告不適用門市列表連結：[redacted_url]•
trans: This product's electronic redemption voucher is valid only for use in Taiwan. It can be redeemed at designated Starbucks locations within the specified redemption period. After the expiration date, it will be invalid. Unless stated otherwise in some announcements, it cannot be exchanged for cash or other products. It is prohibited to transfer, resell, or request a return. It is not valid for delivery, takeout, or pre-order services. List of locations not participating in the announcement: [redacted_url]•
